author:
Tom Jensen                    

                                    
                        @tomjensen100
description: The waterfront Florida mansion of the late NASCAR CEO Bill France Jr. will be sold at auction.
title: Mansion formerly owned by Bill France Jr. and Betty Jane France up for sale | FOX Sports

author: FourFourTwo
description: Zinedine Zidane, 44, is already being earmarked for the France job, according to Frank Leboeuf.
title: Madrid boss Zidane will be next France coach, says Leboeuf

author: talkSPORT
description: Gael Clichy has confirmed he will NOT be a Manchester CIty player next season. The France defender, who joined City in the summer of 2011, is out of contract at the end of the 2016/17 season and will not be signing a new deal with the Etihad Stadium club. When asked at a question and answer session if he would be playing with Joe Hart next season, the 31-year-old said: "It's hard. I'm not sure whether or not Joe will be here next season, and I won't be here next season."
title: Gael Clichy: France defender confirms he is leaving Manchester City when his contract expires in the summer

author: talkSPORT
description: Antoine Griezmann has cast further doubt over his future at Atletico Madrid by admitting he is 'ready to go' in order to win trophies. The France striker revealed on Monday there was a 'six out of 10' chance of him joining Manchester United this summer. The 26-year-old has been consistently linked with a move to Old Trafford in recent months and it now seems there could be some substance to the speculation.
title: Atletico Madrid and France forward Antoine Griezmann fuels Manchester United rumours by admitting: 'I'm ready to go'

author: Samuel Luckhurst
description: The France international is understood to be the top transfer priority at Old Trafford this summer
title: Griezmann discusses Manchester United transfer on French TV

author: The Economist
description: A month ahead of legislative elections, France’s president anchors himself in the centre
title: Emmanuel Macron appoints a post-partisan government

author: Gregory Viscusi
description: Emmanuel Macron begins work on Tuesday on what may be one of the defining issues of his presidency: simplifying France’s labor code.
title: Macron Tackles French Labor Law in First Push to Fix Economy

author: Louie Smith, Alistair Grant
description: The long-range forecast suggests we will see hotter-than-normal temps in June and July due to hot air from France and Spain
title: Forecasters are predicting an eight-week heatwave in a scorching summer of sun

author: Tariq Panja, Gaspard Sebag
description: Two of France’s best-paid soccer players, Argentine attackers Javier Pastore and Angel di Maria, are being investigated on suspicion of money laundering, according to people familiar with the matter.
title: Soccer Star Homes Said to Be Raided in Money-Laundering Case

author: By Alexander Robertson For Mailonline
description: Many in the UK will enjoy temperatures north of 75F today, but hot air arriving from Spain and France will gradually increase heat levels throughout the week, reaching the high 80s by the weekend.
title: Temperatures to reach 86F this week as weathermen predict hot summer
